title: Star Guardian Syndra is a wasted potential
body:
https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BJI8Dw7e3GQ/WYphyP1FzlI/AAAAAAAArBU/LDVX95HIQgQpv6H9F3ryuouXBGASbDbsgCLcBGAs/s200/8c1781366d6f0a12.jpg

---

I mean just look at these little guys (guy?). Isnt he like the most freaking cutest amazing thing youve ever seen? Damaging enemies by making faeries pop up beside them; how cool is that? Not to mention that bubble SFX that comes with it.

Yet Syndras "My potential is limitless" super lame snobbish VO completely ruins the theme. Why waste the potential? Why not make this a legendary skin? Why does it have to be Ahri again? Syndra NEEDS this to be a legendary skin. Its her calling.

---


https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/littlebusters/images/5/57/Yuiko_Icon.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20121019000824

---

This is Yuiko Kurugaya from Little Busters. Shes tall, smart, self-sufficient and is pretty much like the cool big sister. This is exactly what Syndra should be in the group of Star Guardians. The calm, collected, somewhat intimidating of girl. 

If Janna is like the mother hen, then Syndra should be the scary big sis. Rito pls make this happen we dont want Ahri VO we want SYNDRA.

replies.body: Yeah I too was hoping Syndra would be Legendary. I'm just not feeling her VO with this skin, it just doesn't fit right.

If they only had resources to make one Legendary skin for this set, they should have did Syndra this year & save Ahri for the next set. They could have went all out with a more darker SG (NOT evil, darker).  

But instead, they give us both SG Ahri & Syndra at the same time, give Ahri the legendary & completely erase any possibility of Syndra getting a Legendary SG skin. It's likely far too late to turn back now. I doubt they'll send it back to the drawing board like the 2015 SKT skins, unless the whole universe yells for it.

This also brings up the questions: Why was Ahri made into a Legendary rather than just being a 1350 & calling it a day? What made her a better choice over the other 4? Is there something special that Ahri adds to the SG narrative?

Oh well, whatever. I just want to see the splash arts already.
Ahri just simply fits the anime theme better. She's also just got a 1350 skin, Arcade, last year. I mean, let's be serious. She has Fox ears. We all knew this was coming.

Yes, yes. Ahri fits EVERY theme perfectly.

I like Ahri, but it's sickening.
It's literally an Anime skin, for an Anime champ. I'd say this one fits a whole lot more than Arcade did.
The joke is that the most prominent kitsune characters in anime are... guys.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=goiBd3on,comment-id=00020001000100000000,timestamp=2017-08-09T19:21:56.024+0000)
>
> The joke is that the most prominent kitsune characters in anime are... guys.

What do you mean? Kitsune characters are all girls in hentai!

.

.

.

kek

Please, continue.

"NANI??"

https://nijiero-ch.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/kitunemimi20139301014534053213750.jpg

>"NANI??"

https://i.redd.it/wh9pq38hh3ey.png

>https://nijiero-ch.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/kitunemimi20139301014534053213750.jpg

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/861/464/781.gif

Although I'm partial to wolf girls.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/990/823/021.gif
cuz academy Ahri wasn't anime enough

in SG lore ahri, mf, syndra etc are the O.G. team. & of that group ahri is the leader-per say.

It's why in V.O. she looks down upon lux & whatnot

I was also hoping for Syndra or Soraka to be legendary.

She need this VO so bad, Ahri doesn't even need this VO, she had so many wonderful skins already, Arcade, Popstar etc
Gotta please the eastern player base and their corporate overlords.

> [{quoted}](name=ZyniX,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=goiBd3on,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-08-09T18:03:12.095+0000)
>
> Gotta please the eastern player base and their corporate overlords.

And then one day we realise the biggest consumer base for Ahri skins are actually from the west.
Syndra should have gotten it. The voice ruins it. I also hate the outfit. The little pets are adorable though.

Commenting here because I don't have access to the PBE. Hopefully Riot will actually listen to the people saying "pls no".

I have so many problems with the new Star Guardian skins, i'm going to go one by one through all of the champions. My main feelings are that Anime is popular, therefore anime = money, therefore more anime to please the weeb fans.

{{champion:103}} Ahri doesn't need a VO, her voice would match the skin perfectly fine, it's compeltely unecessary and could be used much better on other champions *cough*Syndra*cough*. Feels like Riot has just done this because Ahri is the most popular out of the 5. Additionally, Ahri already has a school based skin. Seriously Riot? Why wouldn't you expand her selection instead of giving her 2 skins which are pretty much the same.
On a personal note her voice annoys the hell out of me, and there isn't enough Kiki (her little pet thing).

{{champion:134}} Syndra, omg why? Just why? There are so many problems with this skin.
1. Thematically, Syndra is dark and powerful. SG Syndra doesn't reflect this well. Both in terms of the skin and the VFX. Everything feels so soft, it's such an odd oxymoron of good & evil, it just breaks my brain to look at. The visual effects are so poofy and soft, other skins do a better job of displaying her control and force. This is what Syndra mains love about her, this skin has completely removed that.
As others have said, Dark Star Syndra would be far more fitting. Regardless of that there are many more concepts that work so well with her personality, this is the last one I would have considered.
1.5 Leading on from this, her voice doesn't match the skin at all. If you had to give one VO in this set, Syndra NEEDED it. Everyone has spoken about this being an issue, I doubt I need to go into much detail. It feels like whoever designed the skin, didn't consider her personality or voice at all. The skin was made to fit the SG set, not to fit Syndra.
2. Whilst her orbs are adorable and I love the concept, they don't fit in. They feel more arcade based. The orbs are the only redeeming feature about the skin, but unfortunately they don't do enough to make me want to buy it.
3. Colour scheme hurts my eyes. It must have been a challenge to get a dark champion to fit in with such a cute theme. One almost wants to believe that Riot would have stopped and thought "Maybe this just won't work".
4. Okay, so here I want to talk about something which affects the other champs in the selection (Miss Fortune). There are champions like Taliyah and Tristana who could have had a SG skin for 1350, simply because their voices wouldn't need to be changed. They are so upbeat and happy, it would be easy to make them all colourful and sparkly. Syndra is the worst case, but I feel like Miss Fortune also has this issue.

{{champion:21}} MF is quite underwhelming. I love her little followers and how they join in with the ultimate. Other than that, she just looks like a lady with pistols. It doesn't feel like Miss Fortune. I don't really know why she has this skin, but I guess it's better than Syndra.

{{champion:81}} It hurts my eyes. There is so much detail and over-saturation that I can't look at it. Spell effects are nice, but he's so  u g l y.

{{champion:16}} Best one, I love it. Matches her personality, looks beautiful and original. I would say that her pet could be more involved with her movement. But I'm definitely buying this one.


If it wasn't obvious, i'm a big fan of Syndra. Overall, i'm very disappointed with these skins. I think a lot of people are, and I hope Riot reconsiders many things about these skins.

While i do agree that SG Syndra could add a little more "darkness", being all light and puffy isnt a problem. Skins are not supposed to directly reflect a champions personality but instead add a different layer on what already exists. Take Omega Squad Teemo for example, the intriguing transition from friendly scout to fearsome soldier. The opposite is what i was hoping from SG Syndra. Perhaps like learning to control her power and not let it control her. Something different and interesting. Not just another "darker overlord" skin

I think a focus is more on max rank animation. In other skins, the orbs crack the ground, it gives the impression that she's so powerful she can damage the terrain. Although, I am all for variation and i'm willing to give the blobby VFX a chance.

Spot on. I would rather them shelf SG Syndra to either work on it more or just scrap it. It's really bad. They have such a plethora of champions to pick as a SG and they choose Ezreal, Syndra and Miss Fortune. Out of Karma, Sona, Taliah, Annie, Tristana, Nidalee and so many more that make more sense than half of the choices . . . they have now. It's all about choices.

> [{quoted}](name=Hens in Ties,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=goiBd3on,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2017-08-09T22:53:35.648+0000)

Everything said here is perfect.  Mf almost feels like a shiny arcade skin and really not worth the price.
When the teaser came out I originally thought {{champion:81}}  was {{champion:133}} and now that they have spotlights I can't gather WHY its not Quinn?? the familiar for ezreal is literally a bird it would of made SO much for more sense for it to be quinn and Male star guardian just I'm not sure comforting?

Agree with all of this. Especially about Syndra. This is the second batch of skins in a row that I feel like one of the skins was a half thought and efforts were lost midway. The first example being Omega Squad Veigar that literally holds a gun yet doesnt use it and then shoots his ult from his forehead. Not sure how some stuff makes it live but not sure Riot cares anymore. $

I agree very much mainly with what you said about Syndra and MF 

As a Miss Fortune main I won't lie I was so excited that she was getting another skin. Then the realization set in that her VO was still the same. That irritated me, there are other factors that put me off from the skin as well. As much as hearing the "sexy waifu pirate" quotes in this skin will get me sad/annoyed. Thinking about Syndra's very dark and powerful lines while in this star guardian skin is kinda.....jarring  

"This power is mine to command."
"A whole world to toy with."
"I am in control."
"Imprisoned no longer."
"They are nothing to me."
"Run, playthings."

All those lines they could have made a darkstar Syndra that's not even legendary and it would work so well with her. And it's not even the lines it's the sounds effect of her voice.
I'd rather not burn Syndra's only legendary skin slot for the next half-decade or so on the SG theme of all things. There are much stronger and better suited themes for her than that.

Hmm... Star Guardians could have a rival team. Dark Star Guardians. NO I don't mean Dark Star. Do you know Winx? They have a rival team, the Trix. They are also fairies but with dark and goth style. I show you. 
Winx
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-PZgZTMBnaW4/T9mcT-O-WpI/AAAAAAAAAm0/-5jo8jZcfgw/s1600/538576_10150968907442460_1063279011_n.jpg 
Trix
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/it/9/9a/Winx_Trix.jpg
http://images6.fanpop.com/image/polls/1349000/1349963_1394049339909_full.jpg

So I think Syndra could fit to such kind of rival team. It's ridiculous she was forced to be a Star Guardian without any new VO

She could be from a rival team, or just an enemy in disguise. 

https://i.gyazo.com/78a7f29b41624c43e5ce54d994b38d59.png
Uh, weren't Trix witches though?
I love this idea! I completely, utterly, 100% agree!!!!

IMAGINE
syndra + elise + lissandra? BADASS rival team!
SG Syndra and Soraka needed to be legendary. Ahri needs to choke.

> Ahri needs to choke.

I'm sure there's a sex joke in there somewhere.
https://media.giphy.com/media/ch1Z4rUWBZBnO/giphy.gif
So much untapped power {{champion:134}}
It feels like this happens everytime with a Syndra skin...

Ah yes but you're forgetting the most important part of this. Money. {{champion:103}}  >  {{champion:134}}  In terms of general popularity (Even faker likes her more) It's a sad truth that we need to face. League may be free to play, but not free to maintain.
It's time for Syndra mains to rise up against the weeb hordes.
Honestly, I was hoping for a sort of "Fallen" SG skin for Syndra. Someone who "fell" to the "Darkside" in the quest for more power, just... minus the overbearing angst.
I do wish Syndra could get a VO for this- but I have to wonder if the VA is still around and whatnot. Correct me if wrong but the other Star Guardians have their same VAs do they not?

Correct, besides Jinx the other Star Guardians have their original VOs, but they all fit pretty nicely. Jinx, the one that really wouldn't fit, was made a legendary, which is exactly what should have happened to Syndra, but she was unfortunate enough to have to compete with the fox waifu so she doesn't get one.

I don't think Ahri deserved it, this whole SG release just feels like a huge mess, there are other champs that deserve SG skins instead of non-legendary Syndra, or MF.

I mean, you can argue for virtually any champion to "deserve" a star guardian skin since it basically has no real requirement besides a human that's young-ish.

However, sassing the enemy (Which apparently is what they wanted) is definitely more Ahri's niche than Syndra.
All her skins have the same VO, which is kind of a shame.

In my opinion you should model the really bad ass champ that is syndra. after kinda a really bad ass char. This is esdeath she is a cool calm and collected leader that when driven by passion she conquers entire citys with great planning and power. she is a bit ruthless but kinda reminds me of the syndra back story. being abused a little as a kid. plus i think the blue would suit her a little more. 
https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/all-of-the-bloodriver-famliy/images/0/0d/Esdeath_body.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150609172351
question is why the hell did she not get a dark star skin rather than a sg skin. the vo would still fit, and she already has justicar for the 'good' side of her.
There's actually a pretty good comment over here: https://www.reddit.com/r/syndramains/comments/6somwa/can_we_all_give_feedbacks_to_riot_our_opinions/

"So much untapped power" {{champion:134}} 
My feeling with what couldve been an awesome Syndra legendary
Gotta appease to the "Ahri mains" who have the body pillow of her and own every skin but can't land a charm or ult over the wall :^)
I do tend to agree that SG Syndra and Soraka really needs that new VO.
No matter how unfair it is that Syndra didn't get the voiceover asking for Riot to change it will do nothing it's already set in stone and won't be changed
It's a bit late now. I agree that Ahri was probably the worst option out of the five to be legendary, but they're not gonna pull a skin to add in VO.
